mapper.update:
update WAM_COD_MAP
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_CNVS_TYPE = #{cdCnvsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_MAP_TYPE = #{cdMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CD_VAL = #{tgtCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CD_VAL_NM = #{tgtCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_CD_VAL = #{srcCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_CD_VAL_NM = #{srcCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CD_MAP_ID = #{cdMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_COD_MAP set RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_CNVS_TYPE = #{cdCnvsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CD_MAP_TYPE = #{cdMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CD_VAL = #{tgtCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CD_VAL_NM = #{tgtCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_CD_VAL = #{srcCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_CD_VAL_NM = #{srcCdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CD_MAP_ID = #{cdMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
, GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM from WAM_COD_MAP A
AND (A.TGT_DMN_LNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' OR A.TGT_DMN_PNM LIKE '%' || #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
AND A.TGT_CD_VAL = #{tgtCdVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
